subtitle: A tangy preserve for bread or serve with desserts.

method.text: Place all the ingredients in the top of a double saucepan, or in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water.
Heat gently, stirring frequently for 35-40 min or until the mixture thickens.
Pour into sterilised warmed jars. Leave to cool. Seal and label. Keep chilled until needed.

title: Ugli fruit curd with Grand Marnier
